title: Essential Greetings
description: Learn how to greet people in Portuguese with common phrases for different times of day and situations.

title: Numbers 1-20
description: Learn to count from 1 to 20 in Portuguese with proper pronunciation.

title: Introducing Yourself
description: Learn how to introduce yourself in Portuguese, including your name, age, nationality, and profession.

title: Days, Months, and Telling Time
description: Learn how to express days of the week, months of the year, and tell time in Portuguese.

title: Ordering at a Restaurant
description: Learn essential phrases for ordering food and drinks at Portuguese restaurants.

title: Common Food Ingredients
description: Learn the names of common food ingredients in Portuguese, essential for shopping at markets and reading recipes.

title: Asking for Directions
description: Learn how to ask for and understand directions in Portuguese, navigate the city, and find your way around.

title: Present Tense Regular Verbs
description: Master the present tense conjugation of regular Portuguese verbs ending in -ar, -er, and -ir.
